definition: to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll
abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate

sentences.english: The hoisting machine can work normally, the brake should be reliable.
sentences.chinese: 提升捲揚機應能正常工作，制動器應工作可靠。

sentences.english: Please read the operation instructions of hoisting machine.
sentences.chinese: 敬請用戶認真閱讀捲揚機使用說明書。

sentences.english: Test the lift hoist reducer and pour the oil according to the demands.
sentences.chinese: 檢查提升捲揚機減速器，按照要求加註規定油麪高度。

sentences.english: Small equipment like the winch shall be placed as is required by the project planning.
sentences.chinese: 捲揚機等小型機械，根據工程的需要規劃擺放位置。

sentences.english: Test if the hoisting machine is normal or not.
sentences.chinese: 檢查捲揚機工作是否正常。

sentences.english: After being used, there should be the special staff to maintain it.
sentences.chinese: 捲揚機投入使用後，應設專人負責維修保養。

sentences.english: After the installment of the hoisting machine and being tested to be qualified, the hoisting machine can be put into use.
sentences.chinese: 捲揚機安裝完畢，經過試車驗收合格，才準投入使用。

sentences.english: A rescue worker was winched into the middle of the building to look for any survivors.
sentences.chinese: 一名救援人員通過捲揚機進入樓層中部尋找倖存者。

sentences.english: Has the electric hoist and hoist's major function.
sentences.chinese: 具有電動葫蘆和捲揚機的主要功能。

sentences.english: When choose the installing position, the place should be convenient for the driver to watch.
sentences.chinese: 選擇捲揚機安裝位置時，保持司機有良好視線。

sentences.english: The winch used inside the mine was took out for displaying.
sentences.chinese: 自坑內取出之捲揚機，固定於水泥制展示臺上。

sentences.english: So the main blast furnace blast furnace iron making winch is one of the important links.
sentences.chinese: 因此高爐主捲揚是高爐鍊鐵的重要環節之一。
